For bug cr571988: Spell checking for pasted mixed content.

On success, you will see a series of "PASS" messages, followed by "TEST COMPLETE".


PASS DIV has 2 markers on '<img src="../resources/abe.png">&nbsp;zz zz.'
PASS verifyMarker(destination, misspelledCount) became true
PASS successfullyParsed is true

TEST COMPLETE
